name: FoxNox
description:
MOVE, JUMP.. ON THE FLOOR AND IN THE CEILING! ...AND GO THROUGH WALLS.

COLLECT NEW FLOPPY DISKS. EACH DISK WILL LET YOU PLAY IN A COMPLETLY DIFFERENT ZONE! GET HIGHER PUNTUATION. WHEN YOU END A ZONE YOU GET A PUNCTUATION BASED ON HOW WELL YOU DID UP TO 3 POINTS. 1 POINT FOR COMPLETING THE ZONE.
1 POINT FOR COLLECTING ALL 20 COINS.
1 POINT IF YOU DON'T DIE. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS - ANY OS WITH JAVA 8 OR SUPERIOR
- KEYBOARD OR CONTROLLER
- SCREEN RESOLUTION OF 1920X1080 OR SUPERIOR FEEDBACK I LOVE GETTING FEEDBACK. ANY ISSUE WITH THE GAME OR IDEAS FOR NEW ZONES ARE APPRECIATED!
